Legacy Priority: 1

Deps: design-parity-checker-6zo
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 2

For dpc quality command, output: version, mode, input object, viewport, score, findings array with severity (warning/info), type (alignment_inconsistent, spacing_inconsistent, low_contrast, missing_hierarchy), message.

## Notes

Quality output now emits score + findings with severity/info and types (alignment_inconsistent/spacing_inconsistent/low_contrast/missing_hierarchy) via heuristics; tests updated.

Implemented experimental quality scoring with heuristics on DOM/Figma/ocr, outputs normalized score + findings; added CLI tests.

tasks.title: Implement Layout/Structure Similarity metric
tasks.body:
Legacy: design-parity-checker-d8h
Type: task
Created: 2025-12-13T21:40:49.43412+01:00
Deps: design-parity-checker-h0g
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 0

Extract elements from DOM/Figma (buttons, headings, text blocks, images, inputs). Normalize coords to [0,1] relative to viewport. Build spatial relation graph. Greedy match elements by type, label, proximity. Score = 0.5*match_rate + 0.5*avg_IoU.

tasks.title: Implement Typography Similarity metric
tasks.body:
Legacy: design-parity-checker-wex
Type: task
Created: 2025-12-13T21:40:49.517311+01:00
Deps: design-parity-checker-d8h
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 1

For matched elements, extract font-family, font-size, font-weight, line-height. Map families to canonical groups. Compute penalties: family mismatch (high), size diff >10% (medium), weight category mismatch (medium). Score = 1 - clamp(weighted_avg_penalty).

tasks.title: Implement combined score calculation
tasks.body:
Legacy: design-parity-checker-5se
Type: task
Created: 2025-12-13T21:40:49.768761+01:00
Deps: design-parity-checker-n0q, design-parity-checker-d8h, design-parity-checker-wex, design-parity-checker-ywj, design-parity-checker-z95
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 1

Combine metrics: similarity = w_pixel*0.35 + w_layout*0.25 + w_typography*0.15 + w_color*0.15 + w_content*0.10. Handle missing metrics by redistributing weights. Implement configurable weights via CLI flags.

tasks.title: Figma figma_to_normalized_view ignores requested viewport dimensions
tasks.body:
Legacy: design-parity-checker-7ip
Type: bug
Created: 2025-12-13T22:46:03.887819+01:00
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 2

figma_to_normalized_view accepts an optional viewport but never uses it; returned NormalizedView width/height always come from the exported PNG dimensions, so callers cannot request a specific viewport or scaled dimensions. Respect the viewport or document that it is ignored, and add tests to lock behavior.

tasks.title: Figma image download uses unauthenticated reqwest::get
tasks.body:
Legacy: design-parity-checker-3qt
Type: bug
Created: 2025-12-13T22:17:50.771689+01:00
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 1

Figma client builds an authenticated reqwest client but download_image bypasses it with bare reqwest::get, losing headers/timeouts/proxies. If the signed image URL requires auth or tighter timeouts, downloads may fail silently. Fix by reusing the configured client with per-request timeouts and add tests for error propagation.

tasks.title: Normalize ignore-region coordinates to viewport
tasks.body:
Legacy: design-parity-checker-039
Type: bug
Created: 2025-12-14T10:08:30.441388+01:00
Legacy Status: closed
Legacy Priority: 2

Ignore-region rectangles are interpreted after resizing screenshots to the viewport, so small coords (e.g., 4x4) do not cover the rendered 1440x900 image. Need to normalize region coordinates to the viewport/screenshot size or accept normalized percentages so masking matches the intended area without giant rectangles.
